title: Master of Healing (3C22)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Elrond (or 2 [Elven] allies) to heal a companion or ally.
Lore:	”'Elrond has cured you: he has tended you for days, ever since you were brought in.'”
Rarity:	C
